Name: Vilma
description:
Vilma is married and has three children in primary school. She is a small-time coffee producer with some experience in the market. Her earnings from this work have allowed her to gather some assets, which facilitates greater care of her crops.

Vilma is requesting a loan from Kiva and Aldea Global to maintain around 5 acres of coffee. She will use these funds to buy manure and other fertilizers and to pay the labor force to apply the manure and other fertilizers, which contribute to the optimal development of the crops.
